translation.en: We're not playing war. War's not even a game.
translation.es: No vamos a jugar guerras. Ni es un juego.

translation.en: -[Stacy] We are too playing war. C'mon. -[Jeff] It's total chance, Stace.
translation.es: - Vamos a jugar. - Es pura suerte.

translation.en: Winner picks the game, Jeff. That's your rules.
translation.es: El que gana escoge el juego. Esa es tu regla.

translation.en: [Eric] Okay, who wants a little Mexican hair of the dog?
translation.es: ¿Quién quiere un trago para la resaca?

translation.en: -[Amy] I'll have some. -[Eric] Oh, you'll definitely have some.
-Come on, Jeff. -No, keep that away from me.
translation.es: - Vamos, Jeff. - No me acerques eso.

translation.en: Well, that's not what you were saying last night.
[laughs] Seriously, Mr. Nude Lifeguard. What was up with that?
translation.es: En serio, Don Salvavidas Desnudo. ¿Qué te traías?

translation.en: I don't know what you guys are talking about.
translation.es: No sé de qué están hablando.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, I declare war.
-No, I'm flushed. I'm just hot. -You're not flushed.
translation.es: No, estoy enrojecida. Es el calor.

translation.en: -[Eric] I knew you would. -[Stacy] You did?
translation.es: Yo sabía que ibas a ganar.

translation.en: Okay. [Eric] I did. Of course I did.
Why don't you look under the towel there?
-[Amy] Look under your towel. -[Stacy] It's not.
-[Amy] Under your towel. -Why would it be under our towel?
-[Amy] I don't know, I think I was... -Did you come lay under here?
[Jeff] We're gonna find it, honey. [Amy] It's my favorite earring.
translation.es: - Lo vamos a encontrar. - Es mi arete favorito.
Ha de estar en la piscina.

translation.en: [speaking with a German accent] I found it. It's yours, I think.
translation.es: Ya lo encontré. Es tuyo. Creo.

translation.en: Hey, do you want a drink?
-It's got ice in it. -[Mathias] It's okay.
-That means it has ice, Eric. -[Mathias] Thank you.
translation.es: - Eso significa que tiene hielo. - Gracias.

translation.en: No, it's not. The water system here is contaminated with human feces.
translation.es: No, el sistema de agua está contaminado con heces humanas.

translation.en: Okay? So your drinks are, like, blended with hepatitis B.
translation.es: Sus bebidas están licuadas con hepatitis B.

translation.en: -[Amy] Yes. Hepatitis B. -How do you know each other?
They're best friends, and we're their boyfriends.
translation.es: Son mejores amigas y nosotros somos sus novios.

translation.en: [Jeff] How about you? Are you here by yourself? Uh-uh.
No, with my brother, but he left with some girl, yeah.
translation.es: No, con mi hermano, pero se fue con una chica.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. She's an archaeologist. He went with her to a dig site.
translation.es: No, la chica es una arqueóloga. Fue a donde están cavando.

translation.en: And what are they digging? [Jeff] Like an excavation?
Yeah, it's ruins, I think. A Mayan temple.
translation.es: De unas ruinas, creo. Un templo maya.

translation.en: [Jeff] Kind of like the ones that nobody here wanted to go to...
translation.es: Como las que... ninguno de nosotros ha querido ir a ver

translation.en: -Yes, Jeff. -...the entire time that we've been here.
translation.es: ninguno de nosotros ha querido ir a ver durante nuestra estancia.

translation.en: Apparently, it's not even in the guidebooks.
translation.es: Ni está en las guías turísticas.

translation.en: Yeah, see, Jeff, that's something I would do.
[Mathias] Well, if you're interested, I'm going there tomorrow.
translation.es: Si les interesa, yo voy a ir mañana.

translation.en: Heinrich was supposed to be back by now,
translation.es: Heinrich ya debería de haber vuelto,

translation.en: but he must be having a good time.
translation.es: pero seguro la está pasando bien.

translation.en: So what do you guys think?
[Jeff] Huh? Ancient Mayan temple off the beaten path?
translation.es: ¿Qué opinan? ¿Un templo maya con acceso limitado?

translation.en: I don't know, a little culture before we leave?
translation.es: ¿Un poco de cultura antes de irnos?

translation.en: Since I just kicked Jeff's ass in cards, I got nothing left to do here.
translation.es: Desde que arrasé con Jeff, ya no tengo nada que hacer aquí.

translation.en: Well, yeah, I mean, as long as I'm back for make-your-own-taco night, I'm in.
translation.es: Sí, mientras volvamos para lo de prepara tus propios tacos.

translation.en: Do we have to wake up early?
You come to beach tonight? To party? Yeah, yeah, yeah. Okay.
translation.es: - ¿Vienes a la playa hoy? ¿A la fiesta? - Sí.

translation.en: They are supposed to be coming with me tomorrow,
translation.es: Se supone que van a ir conmigo mañana,

translation.en: but maybe it's a big mistake.
-They're all fucking crazy in the head. -[all laughing]
So, there was this hotel heiress who dyed her hair blonde.
translation.es: Así que había una heredera de hoteles que se pintó el pelo rubio.

translation.en: [Stacy] But the carpet didn't match the drapes.
translation.es: Pero el tapete no iba con las cortinas.

translation.en: What is it? What's the joke? What's so funny? I'm not...
[Eric] You don't want to know, Mathias.
But the hardwood floor underneath it was all scuffed up and dirty!
translation.es: ¡Pero el piso de madera estaba todo rayado y sucio!

translation.en: -[Stacy] But then it was too slippery. -Ow!
translation.es: Pero entonces se puso muy resbaloso.

translation.en: I'm just not feeling this one.
Jeff, buddy, we got two days left. I wanna see some moves.
translation.es: Jeff, te quedan dos días. Quiero verte bailar.

translation.en: [Amy] It's just like playing the trombone.
Jeff used to play the trombone in high school.
translation.es: Jeff tocaba el trombón en el bachillerato.

translation.en: -[Eric guffaws] Jeffrey on the trombone! -[Amy] He won a prize.
Thank you for sharing that with everybody.
translation.es: Gracias por compartir eso con todos.

translation.en: Now he's gonna be a doctor.
And he's gonna win a prize for that.
translation.es: Y va a ganar un premio por eso.

translation.en: [Eric] Hey, what's up? How are you?
I'll take some. I'll take some.
Amy, it's time to go to bed. Let's go.
translation.es: Amy, es hora de ir a la cama. Vámonos.

translation.en: All right, I'm calling it a night, guys.
translation.es: Yo ya me retiro por hoy.

translation.en: -[giggling] -[Jeff] Good night. Give me a kiss.
translation.es: Yo ya me retiro por hoy. - Buenas noches. Dame un beso. - Acércate.

translation.en: -Come here. Stay. -[Jeff] Give me a kiss.
translation.es: - Buenas noches. Dame un beso. - Acércate. - Dame un beso. - Quédate.

translation.en: -See ya, buddy! -[Jeff] Make sure she gets home.
translation.es: - ¡Nos vemos! - Asegúrate de que llegue a casa.

translation.en: -[Jeff] See you guys tomorrow morning. -[Eric] All right.
-[Amy] My boyfriend, the rock star! -[Jeff] Behave.
translation.es: - ¡Mi novio, la estrella de rock! - Adiós, Ame.

translation.en: Show me a German dance. Come on.
[Mathias] You want me to dance? I can't dance. [Amy] It's so beautiful!
So, how much you wanna bet she kisses him?
She's freaking out 'cause Jeff's med school is like 2,000 miles away, okay?
translation.es: Está trastornada porque la universidad de Jeff está a 3.000 km.

translation.en: -[Mathias] You do a twirl. -[Eric] Okay, how much?
[Stacy] She's not gonna kiss him. That's nice.
translation.es: - Ella no lo va a besar. - Eso me gusta.

translation.en: -It's good, yeah? -How do you do that?
All right, more of the hips. Use the hips. Like this.
translation.es: Más caderas. Hay que mover las caderas. Así.

translation.en: Come here. Come here. I wanna tell you a secret.
translation.es: Ven acá. Te voy a decir un secreto.

translation.en: [Stacy] What are you doing? What are you doing?
I will dance with you, okay?
[Mathias] No. The place that they went, here.
translation.es: El lugar al que fueron, aquí,

translation.en: It's only on this old map. It's gone from the guidebook.
translation.es: solo está en este mapa viejo. No está en la guía.

translation.en: He's making a copy of the map from the girl Heinrich met,
translation.es: Está copiando el mapa de la chica que conoció Heinrich.

translation.en: Yes, your friends look like they could use a map.
All right. Give me a couple of minutes? -Rally the troops? -Yeah.
translation.es: ¿Me das un par de minutos para juntar a las tropas?
- ¿En media hora, en el lobby? - Sí.

translation.en: Do you know what they do to people down here who don't honor their bets?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que te hacen aquí si no pagas tus apuestas?

translation.en: [Eric] No, they do. They take broomsticks,
translation.es: En serio. Agarran palos de escoba

translation.en: and they just like, whack, smash their hands.
translation.es: y te pegan en las manos.

translation.en: It's a true story. It's kind of brutal, but it happens. What are you gonna do?
translation.es: Es una historia verídica. Brutal, pero sucede. Qué le vamos a hacer.

translation.en: Come on! Jeff's gonna be pissed if we miss it.
translation.es: Jeff se va a enojar si se nos va.

translation.en: followed, I'm sure, by the even more frightening whining of Amy.
translation.es: seguida por los temibles quejidos de Amy.

translation.en: No, but I bet she's feeling pretty awkward right about now, don't you?
translation.es: Seguro que se siente un poco incómoda ahora, ¿no?

translation.en: I mean it. Not a word.
Look, it'd be a shame to smash these pretty little hands.
translation.es: Sería una lástima romper esas manitas.

translation.en: Will you please get in the shower?
Come here for a second. Come here. Come here.
translation.es: Ven acá un segundo. Ven acá.

translation.en: You know, you're in Mexico now, muchacha.
And you can't just lose a bet like that and expect to walk away free.
translation.es: Y no puedes perder una apuesta e irte como si nada.

translation.en: How much do I owe you again?
You're gonna be back tonight. I'll just, like, sleep until then.
translation.es: Vas a regresar esta noche. Me duermo hasta entonces.

translation.en: You wanna spend our last day sleeping?
I'll just hang out, like read or something.

translation.es: Descansaré. Leeré o algo. Amy. Por favor.

translation.en: [Jeff] People come from all over the world just to see these ruins.
translation.es: Gente viene de todo el mundo para ver las ruinas.

translation.en: And this one isn't even on the map.
translation.es: Y estas ni están en el mapa.

translation.en: [Jeff] I'm not taking you to some tourist trap, honey.
Don't you wanna have some experience or something to shoot,
other than just the beach, the pool, the beach, the pool?
translation.es: ¿Algo fuera de la playa, la piscina, la playa, la piscina?

translation.en: Well, you're already dressed. You might as well just go without me.
translation.es: Tú ya te vestiste. Vete sin mí.

translation.en: But I don't wanna go without you.
translation.es: Pero no me quiero ir sin ti.

translation.en: [Amy] What are you so happy about?

translation.es: - ¿A cuánto está de aquí? - A 18 km.

translation.en: Hey, how many miles is that?
[Jeff] It's about eleven. Maybe a little bit more.
[Mathias] Then there's a path, which we hike for four kilometers.
translation.es: Luego hay un camino y caminamos cuatro kilómetros.

translation.en: Okay, no one said anything about a hike.
Well, I don't see any cabs. That's a bit of a problem.
translation.es: No veo taxis, lo cual es un problema.
- Sí. - No sé qué estás diciendo.

translation.en: [Amy] No, it's good. Is there a mirror?
How much... you drive us here?
No, no. This place, no good.
translation.es: No, no. Este lugar, no bueno.

translation.en: I'll drive you to pyramid. Muy grande. Everybody go.
translation.es: Los llevo a pirámide. Van todos.

translation.en: I take you. I take you.
[Amy] I wanna stay with the puppy.
-[Stacy] We got new hats. -[Eric] Very nice.
-This is the taxi? -Yeah, this is it. Come on. Let's go.
translation.es: - ¿Este es el taxi? - Sí, este es. Vamos.

translation.en: -[Stacy] My pants are gonna get dirty. -[Amy squealing]
Hey, Jeff. Can you give me some water?
[Jeff] Is this it? [Mathias] Yeah, this must be.
[Amy] Oh, my God, I'm so glad that's over.
translation.es: Dios mío, qué bueno que se acabó.

translation.en: -[Eric] You okay? -[Stacy] My jeans are all dirty.
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? - Me ensucié los pantalones. - ¿Tiene teléfono?

translation.en: -[Jeff] Do you have a telefono? -[Amy] Thanks.
Wait, how are we gonna get back?
We're gonna call him when we get out.
With what? We're not gonna get a signal out here.
My phone should work. It's a world phone.
translation.es: Mi teléfono debe de funcionar. Es un teléfono mundial.

translation.en: Hello? Can you hear me now?
It's like a 20-mile hike I'm gonna do in flip-flops.

translation.es: Son 18 km. Es un poco chistoso.

translation.en: -[Jeff] Problem solved. -[Amy] Can I have my sunglasses?
-[Eric] Is that your brother's Jeep? -Yeah, it is.
translation.es: - ¿Es el jeep de tu hermano? - Sí.

translation.en: [Eric] Yeah, yeah. Come on, let's go. Ready?
[Eric] So, there was this girl who got really, really drunk one night.
translation.es: Así que había una chica que se emborrachó mucho una noche.

translation.en: [Stacy] But she sobered up really, really quickly.
translation.es: Pero se le quitó la borrachera muy rápido.

translation.en: [Amy] Just a stupid game that they were playing last night.
translation.es: Es el juego que estaban jugando anoche.

translation.en: [Eric] But not before she stuck her tongue down some guy's... -Eric. -...throat.
translation.es: Pero no antes de meter la lengua en la boca de un tipo.

translation.en: We cross a stream, then there should be a path to the left.
translation.es: Hay que cruzar un arroyo y luego hay un camino a la izquierda.

translation.en: If we've seen a village, then we've gone too far.
translation.es: Si vemos un pueblo, ya nos pasamos.

translation.en: -Wait, there's a village? -Yeah. A Mayan village.
translation.es: ¿Hay un pueblo? Sí, un pueblo maya.

translation.en: Why did we leave the hotel again?
translation.es: Recuérdenme por qué nos fuimos del hotel.

translation.en: How much further past the stream is it?
[Eric] Yeah, well, I don't see any path.
I'm not gonna scare them. Hello!
-[Eric] You wanna go talk to them? -[Stacy] Yeah.
[Amy] I don't think they speak Spanish. Look.
translation.es: - No creo que hablen español. - Miren.

translation.en: [Mathias] It's here. This must be it.
[Stacy] I don't think that's the right path.
translation.es: No creo que sea el correcto.

translation.en: -It's on the map. -Jeff, do you see how old that map looks?
translation.es: Sí está. ¿Ves lo viejo que es ese mapa?

translation.en: And it was covered. Why would it be covered?
translation.es: Y estaba tapado. ¿Por qué iba a estar tapado?

translation.en: Maybe the archaeologists don't want people to find their site, guys.
translation.es: Quizá los arqueólogos están protegiendo sus ruinas.

translation.en: Great. They're gonna be thrilled to see us then.
translation.es: Genial. Les va a encantar vernos.

translation.en: No, maybe they just found something valuable,
and they don't want people to rob it,
and just get the Mayans to keep people away.
translation.es: y usan mayas para alejar a la gente.

translation.en: [Eric] How far away is it? [Mathias] It's not far.
[Jeff] Well, what do you wanna do?
translation.es: - Me parece raro. - ¿Qué quieres hacer? ¿Regresar caminando?

translation.en: Just turn around and walk all the way back?
[Amy] A hidden path in the middle of the jungle.
translation.es: Un camino escondido a la mitad de la jungla.

translation.en: [Eric] So, do you think those kids were Mayans?
I mean, aren't the Mayans extinct?
Didn't they die of some fucked-up disease?
[Eric] We could be walking through an ancient graveyard right now.
Like a bone depository or something.
-[Stacy] I doubt it. -[Eric mimicking] I doubt it.
[Eric] No, no, I was agreeing with you.
[Eric] Wow. [Jeff] Oh, wow, look at that.
-[Amy] Is... I think this is it. -[Stacy cheering] Finally!
[Amy] Can I have my glasses? -[Jeff] Yeah. -[Eric laughs]
[Stacy] Can I have a drink? Thank you.
What, like a toll or something?
What the fuck do they want?
Show a picture of your brother.
translation.es: Muéstrale una foto de tu hermano...

translation.en: -[Jeff] We're trying to find... -You seen him?
Give to them! Give to them fotografia!

translation.es: - Dame la cámara. - Ame, ¡no te muevas!

translation.en: -Want the camera? -[men yelling in foreign language] Easy. Easy, just...
[Stacy] I can't breathe. I can't breathe. Stace. Stace. Look at me.
-I can't breathe. -[Jeff] Stacy! Look at me!
[Eric] Come on, we gotta go! Come on!
[Stacy gasping] Oh, my God. Oh, God. Oh, God.
[Amy sobbing] Why would they do that?
[panting] Really? If there was a signal on the road, you should be able to--
translation.es: ¿En serio? Había señal en el camino. Seguro puedes...

translation.en: -No, I didn't get one. -What do you mean?
translation.es: - Yo no tenía señal. - ¿Qué quieres decir?

translation.en: No, I mean, I never said...
"Can you hear me now?" What the fuck was that, Eric?
translation.es: - Yo nunca dije... - ¿Me oyes?. - ¿Qué carajo fue eso? - ¡Fue un chiste!

translation.en: What the fuck? It was a joke!
[Stacy] Stop! Stop! Both of you, stop! Please!

translation.es: Quizá haya otra manera de bajar.

translation.en: -[Jeff] They're setting up camps. -[Amy] Why are they doing this?
translation.es: Van a acampar. ¿Por qué están haciendo esto?

translation.en: Maybe they're preparing for something, you know. Like a...
translation.es: Quizá se estén preparando para algo. Como un...

translation.en: It has something to do with the ruins.
translation.es: Tiene algo que ver con las ruinas.

translation.en: And now that we're here, they won't let us leave.
translation.es: No van a subir aquí y no nos van a dejar irnos.

translation.en: So, what do we do, just wait for someone to find us?
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos, esperar a que nos encuentren?

translation.en: Dimitri left them a copy of the map before we left.
translation.es: Dimitri les dejó una copia del mapa.

translation.en: Yeah, and what if they decide not to come, Jeff?
We're supposed to check out of the hotel tomorrow.
The hotel's gonna call the police.
translation.es: El hotel llamará a la policía.

translation.en: Our flight is tomorrow, Jeff. I know, Amy.
translation.es: - Nuestro vuelo es mañana, Jeff. - Lo sé, Amy.

translation.en: But we know what happens if we leave.
translation.es: Pero sabemos lo que pasa si nos vamos.

translation.en: Yeah, but what are we gonna eat? Like, where do we sleep?
I know. We just don't have that much.
translation.es: Ya lo sé. Pero no tenemos mucha.

translation.en: Well, why do you get to decide, Jeff?
Okay. Well, we can all decide.
But just keep in mind that each of us needs a half a gallon of water every day, just to survive.
translation.es: Cada uno necesita dos litros de agua diarios para sobrevivir.

translation.en: And right now, we don't even have a day's worth.
translation.es: Ahora no tenemos ni para un día.

translation.en: -[Stacy] A cell phone? A cell phone. -[Mathias] Heinrich!
[Mathias] Yeah, it's his ringtone. We had the same phone.
translation.es: Es su tono. Yo tenía uno igual.

translation.en: [Amy] How can there be a signal? There's no signal up here.
Amy, in the orange tent, there's a lantern hanging
translation.es: En la tienda naranja hay una lámpara

translation.en: and some matches on the ground. Can you get them?
-Come figure this out. Drop that there. -Okay.
translation.es: Ayúdame a ver cómo funciona esto. Suelta eso.

translation.en: [Jeff] Come on. Amy? All right, pull it now.
-[Eric] This thing needs to be off, right? -[Jeff] Come on.
-[Mathias] I need the rope. -[Eric] You got it?
translation.es: Bien, cuidado. - ¿La tienes? - Sí. Vamos a hacer esto.

translation.en: [Jeff] Yeah, that's it. Let's do this.
translation.es: - ¿La tienes? - Sí. Vamos a hacer esto.

translation.en: -Whoa. Up, up, up! -[Amy] Wait, wait, wait!
-[Jeff] Pull it up! Up! -Pull him up! Hurry!
Oh, Jesus. Fuck. Fuck. Oh, my God.
[Jeff] One of you has to go.
translation.es: Una de las dos tiene que ir.

translation.en: [grunts] Down. We're gonna check the rest of the rope and make sure it's secure. Then one of you--
translation.es: Abajo. Vamos a revisar que el resto de la soga sea segura y...

translation.en: Why do we have to go? Why can't you or Eric?
translation.es: ¿Por qué nosotras y no tú o Eric?

translation.en: We need to work the crank.
Just help him into the sling, and then we're gonna pull him out.
translation.es: Ayúdalo a subirse a la cuerda y lo jalamos.

translation.en: we'll drop the rope and pull you back up, okay?
Stace, you gotta step off. We got you.
It's the end of the rope!
[Eric] We're gonna send the matches down.
You know, we could take one down, cut the nylon into strips.
translation.es: Podemos quitar una y hacer tiras de nailon.

translation.en: You guys, I think he broke his back! He can't move his legs!
translation.es: ¡Creo que se rompió la espalda! ¡No puede mover las piernas!

translation.en: We're gonna have to build a backboard.
No way. We can't move him.
Look, we are not leaving him down there, okay?
translation.es: No lo vamos a dejar allá abajo.

translation.en: How about the backpack frames and the tent poles?
[Amy] Are you listening to yourself? Okay, this is insane.
We have to wait for help, okay?
Stacy, we have to build a backboard!
Amy, there's tape in the tent.
translation.es: Amy, hay cinta en la tienda.

translation.en: Jeff, we cannot move someone with a broken back, okay?
translation.es: ¡Jeff, no podemos mover a alguien con la espalda rota!

translation.en: -Amy, we have no choice. -You know that!
translation.es: - No tenemos más remedio. - ¡Tú lo sabes!

translation.en: You have to go down and help lift him on! [Amy] No.
translation.es: - ¡Tienes que bajar y ayudar a subirlo! - No.

translation.en: -We have to tell them. -[Eric] Tell who?
We have to tell them. Maybe they could call someone.
translation.es: Tenemos que decirles a ellos. Quizá puedan llamar a alguien.
Tenemos que decirles a ellos. Quizá puedan llamar a alguien. Pueden pedir ayuda.

translation.en: Amy, they're not gonna send for help.
No, we have to try, Jeff.
-Help us, please. -[man yelling in foreign language]
-Say it in Spanish. -They don't speak Spanish, Ame.
translation.es: Dilo en español. No hablan español.

translation.en: -I didn't want to come. -Look at me. Amy.
translation.es: Yo no quería venir. Mírame. Todo va a salir bien.
Mírame. Todo va a salir bien.

translation.en: -I shouldn't be here. -We're gonna get out of this.
translation.es: - No deberíamos estar aquí. - Vamos a salir de esto.

translation.en: -They have to. No, they have to! -Ame, Ame!
I don't want us to get shot, Ame, please.
-Why won't you fucking help us? -[Jeff] Ame!
-We have to send it back up. -[Stacy] No, no.
Amy, I can't stay down here any longer.
translation.es: No, ya no me puedo quedar aquí.

translation.en: One of us at his shoulders, the other person at his feet.
translation.es: Una de los hombros, la otra de los pies.

translation.en: It's only a couple of feet, Amy. We can just lift him.
translation.es: Es menos de un metro. Podemos levantarlo.

translation.en: [Jeff] Can you still do it, Ame?
Mathias, we're gonna lift you. -Okay? -[Mathias] Okay.
We're gonna lift you up and out of here.
translation.es: - Sí. - Te vamos a levantar y a sacar de aquí.

translation.en: [Amy] If you lift him at the feet, he's gonna bend at the waist.
translation.es: Si lo levantas de los pies, se dobla de la cintura.

translation.en: Yeah, but I lift him here from his hips, it's gonna arch his back.
translation.es: Pero si lo levanto de las caderas, se le arquea la espalda.

translation.en: -[Mathias screaming] -[Amy] Oh, my! Oh, my God!
Maybe we should carry him into the tent...
translation.es: Quizá haya que llevarlo a la tienda.

translation.en: I don't think we should move him again.
translation.es: No hay que moverlo otra vez.

translation.en: Yeah, but we can't leave him out in the open like this at night.
translation.es: No podemos dejarlo aquí de noche.

translation.en: Let's see if we can find him some aspirin or something, okay?
translation.es: A ver si encontramos una aspirina o algo.

translation.en: To keep his blood moving. Guys?
translation.es: Para que le circule la sangre. Oigan.

translation.en: [Jeff] Look in the tents. Check the backpacks. See what you guys can find.
translation.es: Busquen en las tiendas, dentro de las mochilas. A ver qué encuentran.
Miren, el boleto de avión de Dimitri.

translation.en: He was supposed to leave tomorrow morning.
translation.es: Iba a partir mañana en la mañana

translation.en: So when he doesn't show up tomorrow,
his friends are definitely gonna know that something's wrong.
translation.es: sus amigos sabrán que le pasó algo.

translation.en: How will they know where we are?
They have the map. Dimitri copied the map for them.
translation.es: Ellos tienen el mapa. Dimitri les dio una copia.

translation.en: We just have to make it through tonight. That's it.
translation.es: Tenemos que sobrevivir esta noche y ya.

translation.en: Maybe one of us should keep watch while the other guys sleep.
translation.es: Quizá uno debería hacer guardia mientras los demás duermen.

translation.en: We gotta keep his legs clean.
translation.es: Hay que mantener las piernas limpias.

translation.en: That's how it'll happen if it does.

translation.es: Jeff, no se va a morir.

translation.en: I never should've said to lift him out, should I?
translation.es: Hice mal en decir que lo levantáramos.

translation.en: I never should have said to lift him.
translation.es: Hice mal en decir que lo levantáramos.

translation.en: -Just don't, Stace, okay? Please. -It's my fault. -[shushing] -[sobbing]
translation.es: - No, Stace. Por favor. - Fue culpa mía.

translation.en: We're gonna get him to the hospital tomorrow, okay?
translation.es: Mañana lo vamos a llevar al hospital.

translation.en: [Amy] The Greeks will be here tomorrow.
translation.es: Los griegos van a venir mañana.

translation.en: -Get it off! Get it off! -Okay, okay.
Oh, my God. It's inside my leg.
translation.es: ¡Dios mío! Está dentro de mi pierna.

translation.en: Get it out! Get it out! Get it out!
-I can feel it moving! -Stop! No. I got it out!
The vine, it was inside her.
translation.es: La planta. Estaba dentro de ella.

translation.en: Get it off me! Get it off! Jeff!
Mathias! You just sit there and breathe.
I'm gonna make a tourniquet right now and cut off this bleeding, Mathias.
translation.es: Te voy a hacer un torniquete para parar el sangrado.

translation.en: I don't know how long these'll burn, so you're gonna have to be quick.
translation.es: No sé cuánto vayan a durar, así que apúrense.

translation.en: I'd wait to light them till you're both down there.
translation.es: No las prendan hasta llegar abajo.

translation.en: Link arms. One of you look to the right, the other, your left.
translation.es: Una busca a la derecha, la otra a la izquierda.

translation.en: You'll cover more ground that way.
Search a spot and then move on. Okay?
translation.es: Busquen en un lugar y sigan. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: Come on. We have to find it.

translation.es: - Sale de ahí. - No puedo. - Vamos. - No quiero entrar ahí.

translation.en: I don't wanna go in there. Amy.
[screaming] Pull us up! Pull it up!
Did you find the phone, Amy?
No, there is no fucking phone!
What do you mean, the flower was making the ring?
translation.es: ¿Cómo que la flor estaba haciendo ese sonido?

translation.en: It was vibrating and it was ringing like a cell phone.
translation.es: Estaba vibrando y sonando como un teléfono.

translation.en: How? Amy, how does it do that?
[tearful] I don't know, Eric. I don't know.
It was moving. It was alive. It knows we're here.
translation.es: Estaba viva. Sabe que estamos aquí.

translation.en: -We just have to go. We just... -We can't do that, Stace.
translation.es: Nos tenemos que ir. No podemos.

translation.en: Jeff, you didn't see it. Okay?
translation.es: Jeff, tú no lo viste. ¿De acuerdo?
Yo no me voy a quedar aquí.

translation.en: If we try to leave, they kill us.
translation.es: Si tratamos de irnos, nos matan.

translation.en: Mathias can't move. I can't just leave him here.
translation.es: Mathias no se puede mover. No lo puedo dejar aquí.

translation.en: Okay, maybe we don't all have to go. I mean, I could go. I can get help.
translation.es: Quizá no todos tengamos que irnos. Yo puedo ir. Yo puedo buscar ayuda.

translation.en: There are 50 of them, 60. They killed that little kid, Amy.
translation.es: Son 50 o 60. Mataron a ese niño.

translation.en: [Eric] Okay, so you guys make a distraction.
-I can make it to the Jeep. I can do it. -It's too dangerous, Eric.
translation.es: yo llego al jeep. Es demasiado peligroso.

translation.en: We have to wait. Wait for what, huh?
the Greeks can't find their own fucking hotel room.
translation.es: Los griegos no pueden encontrar ni su hotel.
No van a venir a rescatarnos.

translation.en: We are being kept here to die!
translation.es: ¡Nos tienen aquí para que nos muramos!

translation.en: Four Americans on a vacation don't just disappear!
translation.es: ¡Cuatro estadounidenses de vacaciones no desaparecen así nada más!

translation.en: somebody is going to find us.
We just have to be alive when they do.
translation.es: Solo tenemos que estar vivos cuando lleguen.

translation.en: [Eric] Amy, where are the keys? They're in the backpack.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde están las llaves? - Están en la mochila.

translation.en: No. We stay close. We wait until we're found.
translation.es: No. Nos quedamos aquí. Esperamos a que nos encuentren.

translation.en: We keep someone always on guard, we keep our wounds covered,
translation.es: Alguien está siempre de guardia. Nos vendamos las heridas

translation.en: and we look out after each other. That is the only way.
translation.es: y nos protegemos mutuamente. Solo así vamos a sobrevivir.

translation.en: [Stacy] It's still in there. I can feel it.
See, look how puffy it is.
[Amy] It's just what happens when you cut yourself, okay?
translation.es: Es lo que pasa cuando te cortas.

translation.en: [Jeff] He won't last much longer like this.
translation.es: No va a durar mucho tiempo así.

translation.en: We have to cut them off. Cut what off?

translation.es: - Las piernas. - Dime que estás bromeando.

translation.en: He'll die if we don't. Just please tell me you're joking.
translation.es: - Si no, se muere. - Por favor, dime que estás bromeando.

translation.en: He'll get infected, if he isn't already. Septicemia.
translation.es: Se va a infectar, si no está infectado ya. Septicemia.

translation.en: Well, what the hell is septicemia, Jeff?
An infection, usually in the bones, when it's exposed to bacteria.
translation.es: Una infección. Normalmente en los huesos expuestos a bacterias.

translation.en: No, I'm telling you, he won't last through the day like this.
translation.es: No va a sobrevivir ni un día más.

translation.en: He has no feeling beneath his waist.
translation.es: No siente nada debajo de la cintura.

translation.en: The tourniquets are already in place. We're gonna cut below them.
translation.es: Ya tiene torniquetes. Cortamos abajo de ellos.

translation.en: We have to break the bones first and then cut.
We're not cutting his legs off with a fucking hunting knife, Jeff.
translation.es: No le vamos a cortar las piernas con un cuchillo de caza.

translation.en: [Jeff] There's no flesh covering his bones, Eric.
Okay. Okay, fine. Let's fucking vote.
translation.es: Bueno. De acuerdo. Vamos a votar.

translation.en: You know, raise your hands if you want to cut off his legs.
translation.es: Alcen la mano si quieren amputar.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, he's in med school.
He's not a surgeon. He's not a doctor. He's in school.
translation.es: No es un cirujano, no es un doctor. Es un estudiante.

translation.en: I'm entitled to my vote, Eric.
translation.es: Yo tengo derecho a mi voto.

translation.en: I'll break the bones first, with the stone, then use the knife to cut through.
translation.es: Primero voy a romper los huesos con la piedra y luego voy a cortar.

translation.en: We're heating the pan to cauterize the wounds to stop the bleeding.
translation.es: Vamos a calentar una sartén para cauterizar las heridas.

translation.en: [Jeff] You're not gonna be able to feel a thing,
but if you want to bite down on this,
You should wait in the tent.
He can't feel anything beneath his waist.
translation.es: No siente nada debajo de la cintura.

translation.en: He was screaming. He was telling you to stop.
He was screaming. How could he not feel it when he was screaming?
translation.es: ¿Cómo no sentía nada si estaba gritando?

translation.en: -It was him looking down and seeing it. -This is so not okay!
We didn't have a choice, Amy.
[Amy whispering] Oh, my God. Holy shit.
[Amy] Look, how can it do that?
Do you think Stacy's gonna be okay?
translation.es: ¿Crees que Stacy va a estar bien?

translation.en: I mean, I got it out. I saw it come out.
translation.es: Sí. Le saqué la enredadera. La vi salir.

translation.en: She gets something in her head and...
translation.es: Se le mete algo en la cabeza y...

translation.en: I think making a run for it is our only chance.
translation.es: Creo que solo huyendo podemos sobrevivir.
Te oí. - ¿Me oíste qué? - Te oí tirándotela.

translation.en: -Don't lie to me, Eric. I heard you. -Stace.
translation.es: No me mientas, Eric. Te oí.

translation.en: I heard you. I heard you fucking her!
[Stacy screaming] How could you do that to me?
How could you guys fucking sit there and fuck when I'm in the tent?
translation.es: ¿Cómo pueden coger estando yo en la tienda?

translation.en: Stace, you need to calm down.
Don't tell me what I should do.
-Stacy, you know I wouldn't do that. -I heard you, Eric.
translation.es: Tú sabes que yo no haría eso. - ¡Los oí! - Solo estábamos hablando.

translation.en: -[Amy] We were just talking. I was just... -[Stacy] I heard you moaning, Amy.
translation.es: - ¡Los oí! - Solo estábamos hablando. - Te oí gemir, Amy. - ¡Estaba llorando, Stacy!
- Te oí gemir, Amy. - ¡Estaba llorando, Stacy!

translation.en: What's going on? My boyfriend is fucking your girlfriend!
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasa? - ¡Mi novio se tiró a tu novia!

translation.en: -That's what's going on. -She's just crazy and irrational.
You think she's never cheated on you? Stacy.
translation.es: - ¿Crees que nunca te ha sido infiel? - Stacy.

translation.en: -Fuck you! Fuck you! -[Amy] Fuck you, bitch!
All you ever cared about is your fucking self!
translation.es: ¡Lo único que te importa eres tú misma!

translation.en: She would've slept with Mathias if I hadn't stopped her.
translation.es: Se habría acostado con Mathias si no la hubiera parado.

translation.en: Well, thank God we cut his legs off.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios que le cortamos las piernas.

translation.en: It's eating me like it's eating him.
translation.es: Me está comiendo como se lo comió a él.

translation.en: -Stace. -[Stacy] No. It's inside... It's inside of me. Stacy.
It's in my side, Amy. It's in my... It's...
translation.es: - Está en mi costado, Amy. - Stace.

translation.en: I'll show you. It's here. If you just cut here and here...
translation.es: Te voy a enseñar. Está aquí. Si cortan aquí y aquí...
- Stacy, estás bien. - ¡No me estás escuchando!

translation.en: [plants] You're not listening to me! You're not listening to me!
[plants] You're not listening to me! You're not listening to me!
You're not listening to me! You're not listening to me!
[plants screaming] You're not listening to me!
[Jeff] They don't want us to spread it. That's why they won't let us leave.
translation.es: No quieren que se extienda. Por eso no dejan que nos vayamos.

translation.en: It's old. It has to be. Really old.
translation.es: Esto tiene que llevar mucho tiempo aquí.

translation.en: somehow they've learned not to land here.
translation.es: ya aprendieron a no detenerse aquí.

translation.en: And the horses. Remember? How frightened the horses were?
translation.es: Y los caballos. ¿Te acuerdas del miedo que tenían?

translation.en: -I didn't... -You don't have to say anything.
translation.es: - Yo no... - No tienes que decir nada.
- Tranquila, Stacy. - No fue a propósito.

translation.en: We're gonna start with the one in your leg. Okay, Stace?
translation.es: Vamos a empezar con la de la pierna, ¿de acuerdo, Stace?

translation.en: [Jeff] You might wanna close your eyes.
I wanna see. I wanna see it.
[Amy] Good. Just keep breathing, keep breathing.

translation.es: ¡Sigue respirando! - La tengo. - Bueno, ya casi acaba.
- La tengo. - Bueno, ya casi acaba.

translation.en: [Jeff] Should I stop? Stacy, do you want me to stop?
[Stacy] I'm scared. No. It's okay. Keep breathing.
[Amy] He got all of it. The shirt up.
translation.es: - La sacó toda. - Levanta la camisa.

translation.en: There's more of it. There's more.
Right here. Under... Under the muscle, like by the bone there.
translation.es: Aquí. Debajo del músculo, junto al hueso.

translation.en: Yes, can we cut it? There's no more cutting.
translation.es: - Sí. ¿La podemos cortar? - Ya no vamos a cortar.

translation.en: I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it. -I wanna cut it. I wanna... -[Eric] Hey, don't!
Hey! You can't. You can't keep cutting.
translation.es: No puedes. No puedes seguir cortando.

translation.en: -It's just everywhere. It's in my head. -[Eric] No.
translation.es: Está en todos lados. Está en mi cabeza.

translation.en: -[Eric] It's okay. You're okay. -[Stacy] No, no.
Yeah, you're okay. No, no. I'm not okay. I'm not okay.
translation.es: - Sí, estás bien. - No estoy bien.

translation.en: You keep saying I'm okay. I'm not okay. Why do you keep saying that to me?
translation.es: Uds. dicen que estoy bien. No estoy bien. ¿Por qué me lo siguen diciendo?

translation.en: Amy, did you see it? You saw it, didn't you?
You saw it in my head. I felt it.
translation.es: La viste en mi cabeza. La sentí.

translation.en: [Eric] Stacy. Why won't you look at me?
You saw it? Did you see it? No, I... There's nothing there.
[Eric] There's nothing there, okay? I swear.
translation.es: Ahí no hay nada. Te lo juro.

translation.en: It's in my head. I feel it, you guys.
translation.es: Está en mi cabeza. La siento. Está en mi cabeza.

translation.en: [Amy] Let's move her in the tent. [Stacy sobbing] Okay.
translation.es: Hay que meterla en la tienda.

translation.en: No one's coming. I'm going tonight.
translation.es: No va a venir nadie. Me voy esta noche.

translation.en: [vines mimicking Stacy] I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it.
[vines] I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it.
I just... I just have to get this one out.
Just have to get this one. [grunting]
Give it to me right now. -No! -[Jeff exclaims]
I'm very sorry. I have to get this piece right here...
translation.es: Perdón. Es que tengo que sacar este pedazo de aquí.

translation.en: -Stacy. -...here, in my... -Stacy, give me the knife. Stacy. -[Stacy grunting]
Stacy, give me the knife, okay?
[crying] Amy, I didn't mean to! I'm sorry!
[Stacy] Yes! Kill me! Kill me. Kill me! [Amy sobbing] No!
[vines] Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!
[vines mimicking Stacy] Kill me! Kill me!
Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!
you run as fast as you can, okay?
translation.es: corres lo más rápido que puedas, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: When you get to the Jeep,
you don't wait for anything. Anything.
translation.es: no te demores por ningún motivo. Por nada.

translation.en: And if these don't work, then you run,
translation.es: Y si estas no sirven, entonces corres...

translation.en: and you don't stop until you reach the town.
translation.es: y no paras hasta llegar al pueblo.

translation.en: You promise me that you'll still be here?
translation.es: ¿Me prometes que todavía vas a estar aquí?

translation.en: You don't even know her name.
translation.es: Ni siquiera saben cómo se llama.

translation.en: You don't know any of our names.

translation.es: Yo soy Jeff. Jeff Dean Macintyre.

translation.en: I was gonna be a doctor. That was my dream.
translation.es: Iba a ser doctor. Ese era mi sueño.
Eso era todo lo que quería.

translation.en: You should know her name, too.
And she is not gonna die on this fucking hill!
translation.es: ¡Y no va a morir en esta maldita colina!
¡Y no va a morir en esta maldita colina! ¡Jeff!

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come on...
